                       throws java.io.IOException
        Check for some new versions
        Returns:
        True if there is some new versions, false if not
        Throws:

      • update

        public void update()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Download all files in the filesToDownload ArrayList, Unzip all zip files in the filesToUnzip ArrayList, Remove all files in the fileToRemove ArrayList
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If it can't download/unzip/remove a file
